creditline: Gift of Kim and Gloria Anderson
description: knitting basket form; cylindrical body; open-weave star design
signed: incsised bottom: 竹雲斎造之 {Chikuunsai kore o tsukuru} (Chikuunsai made this)
text: Chikuunsai was one of the first bamboo artisans to receive recognition for the excellence of his designs. His work was particularly admired for the small, tight knots that adorn the rattan handles and rims of his baskets.
title: Cylindrical basket
